description: NuGet packages blocked from use in EFT Viewer due to license incompatibility. This list is checked by the license-check CI workflow on every PR that modifies .csproj files.

blocked_packages.name: iTextSharp
blocked_packages.reason: AGPL-3.0 license -- copyleft, incompatible with MIT-licensed project.

blocked_packages.name: itextsharp.xmlworker
blocked_packages.reason: AGPL-3.0 license -- copyleft, incompatible with MIT-licensed project.

blocked_packages.name: itext7
blocked_packages.reason: AGPL-3.0 license -- copyleft, incompatible with MIT-licensed project.

blocked_packages.name: QuestPDF
blocked_packages.reason: Revenue-gated license -- free only for organizations under $1M annual gross revenue.

blocked_packages.name: ImageSharp
blocked_packages.reason: Revenue-gated Six Labors Split License -- free only under certain conditions. Use SkiaSharp (MIT) or System.Drawing alternatives instead.
